price: A ti nikako ne misli da Allah ne mari za onim što rade nepravedni! On ih samo pušta do Dana kada će im oči ostati otvorene!
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَٰفِلًا عَمَّا يَعۡمَلُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَۚ إِنَّمَا يُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ لِيَوۡمٖ تَشۡخَصُ فِيهِ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna al-laha ghāfilan ʿammā yaʿmalu al-ẓālimūna innamā yu-akhiruhum liyawmin tashkhaṣu fīhi al-abṣāru
